alert.note: Alert for Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:02PM EDT until June 16 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LICKING COUNTY... At 401 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Utica, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Newark, Utica, Hanover, St. Louisville, Fredonia, US Route 62 at State Route 661, Fallsburg and Purity. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
